body_html: Yeah, diag_* is definitely good for discoverability, but it's a much worse method name 😕 Can't really say which one is better, but I think diag_embed is better. We can't expect people to go through 400 functions we provide.
body_text: Yeah, diag_* is definitely good for discoverability, but it's a much worse method name 😕 Can't really say which one is better, but I think diag_embed is better. We can't expect people to go through 400 functions we provide.
body: Yeah, `diag_*` is definitely good for discoverability, but it's a much worse method name 😕 Can't really say which one is better, but I think `diag_embed` is better. We can't expect people to go through 400 functions we provide.
